fruits.name: apple
fruits.description: The usually round red, green, or yellow fruit of a small tree of the rose family.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: A rounded, reddish yellow, bitter or sweet citrus fruit that can be eaten.

fruits.name: Lemon
fruits.description: The yellowish, acid fruit of a subtropical citrus tree.

fruits.name: Pear
fruits.description: The rounded fruit of a tree of the rose family.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: The fleshy red fruit of a stemless plant belonging to the rose family.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: A tropical plant having a short stem and rigid, spiny leaves.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: A large melon with a hard, green rind and sweet, juicy, usually red pulp.
